name: Thunderbird FlatStudio Tabs (like tabs-2.css)
description: This style makes Thunderbird tabs look like those in the FlatStudio GTK+ theme (without the rounded corner, as when tabs-2.css is selected in gtk.css). This is a direct port of my Firefox FlatStudio Tabs style.

additional_info:
For use with the default Thunderbird theme. This has only been tested on GNU/Linux. Please restart Thunderbird after applying this style, or updating to the 2014-04-06 update. This was inspired by squid's Firefox FlatStuidoDark tabs style, but uses no code from it and does not require the GTK+ Native theme. The window theme used in the screenshot is Bar. This user style is licensed under the terms of the Mozilla Public License, version 2.0. Starting with the 2014-04-06 version, the source code for this style is also available in a Git repository. Changes: 2015-05-23 (bcd5a1a):
  • Update for consistency with the Firefox version; no visible changes for Thunderbird. For a list of changes, see the Firefox version's changelog.
2015-05-21 (68a0af5):
  • Fix extra space above the tab bar.
  • Fix position of toolbar buttons on the tab bar.
2014-04-06 (e3dabf6):
  • Ported the new rewrite of the Firefox version. For a list of changes, see the Firefox version's changelog from April 1 to April 5, 2014.
2013-05-22:
  • Disabled toolbar buttons are no longer highlighted when hovered.
  • Set border-radius: 0 on .scrollbutton-up and .scrollbutton-down (fixes a cosmetic issue).
2013-05-15:
  • Better support for lightweight themes as well as user styles that change the background and text color of the tabs toolbar.
2013-05-03:
  • Initial release.
